greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the convergent to the sum of (1/9)^p where p ranges over the set of prime numbers.
formula: Equals 8 * Sum_{k>=1} pi(k)/9^(k+1), where pi(k) = A000720(k). - _Amiram Eldar_, Aug 11 2020
program: (PARI) /* Sum of 1/m^p for primes p */ sumnp(n,m) = { local(s=0,a,j); for(x=1,n, s+=1./m^prime(x); ); a=Vec(Str(s)); for(j=3,n, print1(eval(a[j])",") ) }
results.author: _Cino Hilliard_, Nov 17 2007
